name: MindMess Web
description:
This game was done for the Ludum Dare's game jam.

ZQSD/WASD/Arrows to move (left joystick on xbox pad), Space to jump (A on xbox pad), A/left-click to use hammer when you’ll have it (X on xbox pad), E to interact (Y on xbox pad)

Credits:

Code : Alexandre Vanhove, Florian Kuhlmann, Guillaume Biquet

Game Design: Maxence Gallancher, Jean Arthur Boulet

Sprites & Animations: Guillaume Biquet

Musiques & sound design: Maxence Gallancher, Alexandre Vanhove
